website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for its durable construction that's designed to outlast similar braces and gel compression pad that delivers superior targeted pain relief.
pros: Crafted from high-quality materials, this elbow brace will stand the test of time and is backed by a lifetime warranty
Gel compression pad outperforms air-filled varieties, providing fast, effective relief and support
Easily adjustable with a Velcro strap for customizable sizing
A value-packed option with a helpful e-book, wrist sweatband, and two braces so you're never left unprotected
cons: More expensive than other braces, but well worth it considering the quality and the extras

customer_reviews.title: Performance for this product
customer_reviews.text: This Elbow Brace is the second one, 1st one was lost and my wife believes in this brace and swears by its results. She had ligament damage and it was very painful and annoying and this brace was recommended to her by a physician. We bought one and almost immediately the pain had dissipated so whenever the pain returns she puts it on and it does what it was meant to do provide support and get rid of the pain. I guess you can say this is like a commercial *DOCTOR RECOMMENDED* but this one actually works
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: One night and I am convinced
customer_reviews.text: I have had golfer's elbow on and off for a while but recently it got bad enough that I sought out this brace. I was skeptical that something you don't put directly on the sore part would work. I wore it once I got it yesterday and had read it should also be worn to bed, and I am so glad I did. I woke up this morning with absolutely no pain in my elbow (until I started using it). It was enough to convince me that this works and works well. I will continue to use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Monteith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fit 13" or bigger forearms
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6ft tall male weighing 250lbs with good size muscular arms: I find the cuff is pretty small, barely reaching around the elbow area (for tennis elbow tendinitis). The extra two small ones don't even fit around my wrist. With the extensions you can make it work - but you need help to get it on the Velcro properly as the bands are stiff and don't bend in the right place to do it one handed. Velcro is not located where needed. Poorly designed and not comfortable. Just a stiff strap with Velcro slapped on. Doesn't offer any relief when you do get it on. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BigDan

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS elbow band
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I decided to order this particular item. I read reviews and found that the majority of people were very happy. Add me to the list of happy customers! My old elbow brace was "old school" as my physical therapist put it. I can wear this new brace under my long sleeves or on top and it doesn't move around. It's much smaller than the "old school" one and is extremely comfortable. I often check to see if it's on because it's really that comfortable. I no longer have unnerving nerve pain. This has controlled it 100%. I'm not kidding. I'm not being paid for my review. I'm just a regular customer who made a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JLE

customer_reviews.title: The pad is too small
customer_reviews.text: The pad on this product was way too small to stabilize the tendons. It hurt more using it than going without it. So I'd recommend a different product (that was recommended by my doctor)... the alternative product is called: "Pro Band Sports Bandit Arm Band" (Amazon url is below). They have two opposing, really large, curved surfaces to hold the brace securely on my arm and to immobilize the problematic tendons while still being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Best for heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.text: I use compression sleeves for everyday comfort. They work well for my tennis elbow, and seem to shift the pain away from the elbow and tendon itself and distribute it more evenly across my arm. When I'm working my arms hard though (I am currently finishing my basement) I use the elbow brace. It does a much better job when you have to lift heavy objects, or do seriously strenuous tasks. Long story short: wear a compression sleeve when sitting at a desk all day, wear the elbow brace when lifting things, exercising, or doing hard work with your arms.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Did not help my elbow but the company provides EXCELLENT Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I primarily play golf and began suffering severe elbow pain while playing. I was diagnosed with tennis elbow (go figure) and I purchased this product based on the reviews and claims. I tried playing several rounds of golf while wearing the product and it did not provide any relief. I must commend Simien as they stand 100% behind their products. The company provided me a complete refund, no questions asked! Although the product did not help in my situation I admire company's like Simien who stand behind their products and provide EXCELLENT customer service.
customer_reviews.author: DeanH2os

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: this helped with 2 different injuries: tennis / golfers elbow (though i play neither) and a severe sprain of the forearm extensor muscles and tendons. i did have to glue the straps in place that hold the tightening bands to keep the material from bunching up while wearing it. i can even sleep with it on if i need too. just be careful not to put it on too tight, as it will make your hand get cold. all in all a very good product with great value!!
customer_reviews.author: grendelskeeper

customer_reviews.title: pretty good... not perfect
customer_reviews.text: overall I feel the product is pretty good. although I feel like it could be better in a couple places.The band stretches when you tighten it sufficiently. this causes the band to narrow. so now the rough portion scratches your arm while you're wearing it. I wish the contact portion was more narrow and sturdy material to be able to apply more pressure in a more precise placement.
customer_reviews.author: Greenbling

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tendinitis Brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace REALLY came in handy. It helps to isolate the tendon so now I can get back to lifting in the gym (AFTER my 6 week break per Dr's orders). I like the fact that you get two braces and they have different size straps included. I use my brace 4 days a week and to make sure I don't forget it, I keep it around the gear shift in my car. This is a great brace for the money and it doesn't slip down the arm.
customer_reviews.author: TOPAZW

customer_reviews.title: Nice brace overall, did not help in his case
customer_reviews.text: The brace was nice, easy to put on, and fit well. It came with 2 small straps for smaller arms and 2 L/XL straps already fit with the pad. The larger strap fit my husband’s arm well, it just didn’t help relieve his pain. These braces work well for some (I’ve had some patients say their pain is completely relieved) but in our case, the KT tape worked better. My general impression is it can definitely help and is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V

customer_reviews.title: ... with an arm workout and it just wouldn't get better this time
customer_reviews.text: I was plagued with tendinitis (tennis elbow) for about 6 weeks after overdoing it at the gym with an arm workout and it just wouldn't get better this time. After using this elbow brace for a couple of weeks, wearing it 24 hours a day, except when I showered, it is finally getting better and I have even been able to bowl on my league again and am beginning light workouts at the gym. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Works but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I am a short person and when wearing this brace near my elbow as instructed, there is not as much distance to the wrist area as a tall person. The bulkiness of the brace is visually very distracting to me when playing sports. I wish there was a design that was more compact and flat. This brace does work when I wear it- the pain was much less in just minutes. Customer service is A+.....they contacted me quickly and refunded. The product works, just not on my small arm while playing sports.
customer_reviews.author: clm

customer_reviews.title: Good brace to Junk in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Once I use more and see if Braces are durable I'll boost to 5 stars. (I have a tendon tear in the works). These Braces definitely help the issue and help with the pain. Braces are comfortable on bare arm or over compression sleeve. Velcro seems to bite solid. Only downfall is the weird Odor these have. My kitchen stunk from these sitting on counter the day I received.. ***UPDATE..LASTED 2 MONTHS THEN VELCRO COMPLETELY GAVE UP AND MORE OR LESS DISAPEARED . Now there useless, liked them while they lsted
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Kit was well worth the money. It comes with small and large straps to fit most arm sizes. Comes with instructions on how to wear properly, but Simian also sent a video how-to a couple days after it arrived and included a doctor demonstrating different arm exercises you can do to help ease your pain and build strength back in the area. I found the brace to become a little uncomfortable after about 6 hours of continuous wear, so I took it off for awhile and found I really didn't need it the rest of the day, due to the pain having subsided.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but not really for heavy working out.
customer_reviews.text: Finally a brace that “hits the spot”. The built in cushion hits the myofacial point on my forearm with golfers elbow, taking some of the strain off. I reckon however that this brace is better worn on a regular everyday type basis and not so much when lifting. I find it actually gets in the way of curls and can cut off circulation. Also, like many others have said, the band stretches out almost immediately. I really would have given this 3 stars, but compared to how lousy other elbow bands have fared? This one has them beat.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have computer elbow and the product seems to help. I use it most of the day and at night when I sleep. It seems that it normally gets worse at night as I must sleep in postion that aggravates my condition and I generally wake up with little or no pain when I use the product. While they generally tell people not to use it when sleeping it works for me. I do take it off periodically to let my skin go back to normal as the product leaves a mark but it fades quickly once it is removed. I do recomend it if you have comuter elbow.
customer_reviews.author: H. A. Kaskoff

customer_reviews.title: It helped my son with his tennis elbow.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my son who is suffering from tennis elbow. He had one ready, which I didn't know about, bit a different brand that was not the job. After an hour with this product I heard him say to his wife that this band was really helping with the pain. I am so glad I was able to help.him out. Good product and it came with an extra band in the box details of which I can't provide because he only used one of them. I will update in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anahull

customer_reviews.title: Large/X-Large Strap is too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14" forearm, which I don't think of as bigger than Extra-Large, however the Large/X-Large strap will barely fit around my forearm and the ends easily tear loose because there so little area to attach to.
customer_reviews.author: DaveF-Pgh

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief - thank you
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery which was nice when you’re in a lot of pain. It’s very comfortable and relieves tendonitis pain. The only reason it didn’t get a 5 star was because the elastic band stretches out and I can see having to use the other one that came in the package. I don’t know what the 2 small braces would be for though. Too tiny for an adult to wear on any part of your body. It would be nice if you had an option to switch the 2 small ones for 2 of the large braces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as the reviews online indicated it was the best brace for tennis elbow. It was shipped promptly and I received online instructions as well those included in the package. There is also an 800 number to call for further assistance. I don't feel I have let the tennis elbow get too bad but I may have to call the number to determine if I am putting the device on correctly as it is bulky and uncomfortable and not relieving my discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not reduce my 'tennis' elbow pain.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty hopeful reading the reviews but sadly this did not work for me at all. I have 'tennis' elbow, except mine was brought about from clays shooting. Wearing this during my latest shooting session did not relieve my pain even a small amount, it was like I didn't have anything on. And it did not provide any relief just wearing it around the house while doing the activities of daily living. Also, if this matters to you, it's very big and bulky. It sticks up from the arm quite a bit. I thought it would be more flush with the arm itself. I'm disappointed but I guess if it seems too good to be true, it usually is.
customer_reviews.author: TriGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased...
customer_reviews.text: Having a mild case of medial epicondylitis (golfers elbow), my physical therapist recommended an elbow brace. The Simien brace seemed a good value. It's very high quality, which impressed even the therapist, and it seemed helpful in alleviating the soreness. As some others mentioned, there was a slight odor after initial unpacking but it quickly diminished. I was very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for both my elbow and forearm issues. Better than anything I've ever tried. I wear them daily at a physically active work-space for 40hrs/wk. for over 6 months and they have held up very well. One small issue is that one of the plastic eyelets turned sideways (not stitched tight enough?), eventually the one on the other side did too, which caused me to have to pull the straps tighter which eventually caused the seam holding the eyelet to break. I sent an email and BAM! THEY RESPONDED IMMEDIATELY AND SENT TWO NEW ONES WITHIN 3 DAYS, NO QUESTIONS ASKED. I am very !@#$%*&%$ impressed! I will order them again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moler

customer_reviews.title: A little too big for women
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to relieve elbow pain when I work out at the gym. I find that the band is sized more for men or maybe bigger boned women. I have to almost overlap the velcro straps to keep it snug enough to provide the needed support and keep it from moving. For those reasons I was only able to give 3 stars. Good quality but just not a good fit size wise. I ate wearing though so not a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Really worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: "Truthfully, I was skeptical how much this could help my tennis elbow (actually pickleball elbow ;-) ), but it was getting worse every game, until I had to quit playing one day during a match. So I took 2 weeks off from play, and, after reading many reviews, ordered one of these braces. It helped so much, I can now play for hours, 2 or 3 times a week! (One hint: it's CRUCIAL where you place it - keep trying until you find "the spot").
customer_reviews.author: The Leitners

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ; comes with two and some accessories
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist recommended I get this for my Golfer's elbow...it works like a champ!! Two come in the box with a couple of other freebies. I keep one in my car just in case, if I don't put it on in the morning, but begin hurting later in the date. You'll want to make sure that the padded part is fit snug onto the pain point, but don't make it too tight. After wearing it for a day or two, you'll figure out how much pressure you'll need when you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Pain Relief Immediately, well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is 5 stars for the pain relief but 4 stars for the velcro not lasting. They do send you two, because the first one died on me. It really is amazing how a strap to the bone/muscle of the forearm takes away the pain of a tennis elbow. I was in great pain until I purchased this product, and it did take the away the pain immediately. I felt kind of stupid wearing it around, but less pain. I hope you never get a serious elbow injury (my first), but BUY this if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sayers

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my tennis elbow and noticed an ease in pain immediately. It seemed too good to be true, but I wear it all day now. The compression sleeve did nothing, so was especially pleased that this really does something. I went to the orthopedic surgeon and he said the two best things are icing and these elbow braces. I got a cortisone shot, but it only worked a few days.
customer_reviews.author: J Dittmer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on by yourself
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my right elbow. I wanted one that was easy for me to put on by myself. This was easy to put on by myself and was okay as far as comfort was concerned. I can’t say it was the answer to my prayers as far as any immediate relief from the elbow pain but after about 2 weeks my elbow was feeling better. Was it the brace or was it just time and resting the elbow?? I would say give this brace a try
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was tough for me to review. I think it's a good product and it is durable. It just didn't work for me as far as providing relief for my golfer's elbow. There are 2 sizes included (small and large), which was helpful depending on whether or not it was going over a shirt or worn with a tank top. My physical therapist had me wear it very tight, which is not comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on Amazon reviews & I am disappointed. Today, I had the opportunity to play in a pickleball tournament & of course I wore the band. I put it on as instructed, but it would repeatedly come loose & fall to my wrist. Now if you play competitive pickleball, you know when making a shot, it is a distraction if an elbow brace drops to your wrist! That said, the customer service is first-rate, simply put, excellent! For that reason alone, I recommend others trying the brace & if does not work for you, the company will make things right.
customer_reviews.author: BobR

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes get some pain in my right arm mostly at night & it gets so bad that I can’t get to sleep. Read the reviews on this & thought I would try it. The price is good, so I thought even if it didn’t help I wouldn’t be loosing much. Much to my surprise, it works. I don’t use it during the day because the pain just seems to happen at night when lying down. This brace is wonderful. I used to take a pain pill for the pain, but I don’t need to anymore. The brace does it’s job of taking away the pain. I don’t understand why it works, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Takes Away My Elbow Joint Pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked but these things are amazing. My elbow joints are constantly in pain and especially when I’ve done a lot of yoga. I heard about these from a friend and they work!! When my elbows start to hurt, I put these on and almost immediately get relief. I’ve been leaving them on for a couple of hours and then the pain is gone for several hours when I take them off. It’s incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Nah.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. Save your cash. This does not work for Tennis Elbow or Golf Elbow (what is the real difference anyway?). I wore it for a few days, and it was itchy, and my pain never went away. I wanted to chuck it in the pond behind our house, but I didn't. I figure, keep it, since I bought it, and maybe someone else I know could use it. But yeah, does not work. At least not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: and does not fall off and is very comfortable -- no velcro rubbing on my skin
customer_reviews.text: I had a flare of my lateral epicondylitis from crossfit. The brace my orthopedic gave me what a cheap balloon on a strap. I decided to buy this Simien Tennis Elbow brace based on the reviews -- and it did not let down. It is a high quality product, and does not fall off and is very comfortable -- no velcro rubbing on my skin. I used it also in some workouts, and it really made a difference. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ONS

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received this brace and it includes two strap sizes. The braces work well if it is wrapped with a little bit of pressure. Unfortunately, the brace straps were a slightly large for me and I could not get it to wrap as tightly as I needed it to without significant strap overlap (which causes the 'velcroed' area to be small and the straps come off after a little while). The customer service and follow up was excellent and when I requested for a smaller strap, they went above and beyond what I expected and issued me a full refund. Overall, good product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gurug

customer_reviews.title: I fish in Florida using a jigging technique, meaning ...
customer_reviews.text: I fish in Florida using a jigging technique, meaning flicking my wrist nearly constantly. My elbow was beginning to cause me so much pain I couldn't fish as much as I wanted. After using the brace, the results are remarkable, to the point of nearly miraculous. Not only did it relieve the pain I felt when fishing, but my elbow has no lingering pain after the fishing trip.
customer_reviews.author: msboles

customer_reviews.title: Great for tennis elbow.
customer_reviews.text: I got tennis elbow by overdoing it as a beginner learning to play pickleball. Apparently, if you place it right, it compresses the tendons just before where they connect to the bone so that, when you tense your muscle, it relieves some of the strain on the connection to the bone, thus minimizing the damage. At least that's how I understand it. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. F. Kelley, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great support really cuts down on the swelling.
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I used this for awhile to write my review. I have had recurring issues since the late 80's and have had different types of straps and things along this order since then. This is easy to put on and comfortable. It really does offer enough compression with the compression pad to really cut down on swelling. I love the way there were 2 in the package to allow for bilateral use of the rinsing out of one while you still have one to use. The biggest difference I have noticed in this one and some of the older ones I have had over the years is the way it cuts down on swelling.
customer_reviews.author: Bookjunky Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good product for reducing elbow pain .
customer_reviews.text: After two days of use, I have noticed an improvement. (About 25% reduction ) of elbow pain. Also, when swinging my golf club, if put on properly, it reduced my elbow pain during and after swinging a golf club. I returned a venom elbow sleeve prior to ordering this replacement product. Even though the venom sleeve had higher review ratings, said sleeve was totallly ineffective and was very itchy. Hopefully the Simien brace will continue to help my two month old tennis elbow condition...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: His Humble Servant

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, this is a well made product. For whatever reason it simply did nothing for me. Even after the closed reduction put my elbow back how it is supposed to be, and I was released to use something like this. The physical therapist recommended the air cast, which I have been using for last couple of days. Even though I like the look of this product, and it feels like a much better product, it just doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Krunch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality,  one drawback for me
customer_reviews.text: As headline says, this tennis elbow strap is excellent quality and is very comfortable. I would give this 5 stars but I have one issue: The large strap is a touch too large to really cinch down tightly for weight lifting and the small strap that came with it is too small to fit around my forearm. Something in between would be great. My forearm measures 12.75" for reference. If your forearm is smaller or larger, then this is definitely a 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Spence

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: After researching all available braces for tendinitis I purchased this one and am glad I did. It is easy to use, unlike some others that almost require two people to manipulate. It is comfortable, durable, easy to put on and take off and functions as it should. It works for tennis elbow or golfers elbow. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Day Trader

customer_reviews.title: Works for "golfer's elbow"
customer_reviews.text: Golfer's below doesn't mean I'm a golfer...I'm not. it refers to the location of the pain. Inside the arm is golfer's while outside is tennis elbow. Both Tennis Elbow and Golfer's Elbow are forms of epicondylitis, an inflammation of tendons that attach to the elbow and for me this brace helped. Just don't look for a miracle cure if you're of "senior" age like me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates golfer elbow pain
customer_reviews.text: I had been having problems with picking up any sort of weight with my left arm after feeling something pop during a golf round. I didn't want to go to the doctor and suffered for a couple months with the pain. Enter this product! Using this product eliminated any pain or discomfort I had in using my arm. Even if I wasn't planning on doing any lifting or golfing, i still wear this brace for the comfort it provides. During my golf round, I have the power and and comfort back to focus on my swing, not the pain! I can't believe something so small and simple can be the answer I've needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff that really works.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set, not much for over the top reviews but these things ROCK. I have been having huge issues with my elbows and that has limited my activities. These have really helped. I am back to doing things that before would have resulted in excessive pain while doing and the next day. Not anymore, still some pain but it is very tolerable. This pair are going to stay inside and clean.."
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality, very well made elbow brace. Lucky for me the package includes two braces because I left one behind at my doctor's office that was too far away to go back for it. I can't say one way or the other as to how well it is at relieving my pain yet, since I have never had tennis elbow before and don't know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Brace that works for Tennis Elbow
customer_reviews.text: Well so far so good...went back to my normal swing, from my tennis elbow bunt style, and no pain. I should admit using a new racket with smaller grip, but, I believe the combination is improving my situation. That is not to say that I don't have some low grade pain in the elbow when I am lifting items or doing push up's, but, when playing tennis, however, able to hit out without jarring pain.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffers from tennis elbow and this is the only thing that takes the pain away. I am not sure what the magic is behind it but, if it weren’t for this, my husband would be in excruciating pain. He is 35-years old and already suffers from tennis elbow due to his hard he works. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just the apparatus you need!
customer_reviews.text: My friend is a PT assistant. She recommended both the apparatus and Dr. Jo. I'm so impressed by the customer service offered by the seller. The fact that they reached out to make sure the band was meeting my needs was impressive enough, but they also included instructional videos and PDF's allowing me to refer back when I have questions while trying to treat my pain
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tenney

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, can be extended to fit any size.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. I'm large and was able to add one of the included short/medium straps to the medium/large strap already fitted on the brace (all velcro attachments) and it works exactly as it should. With the additional staps as extenders, it will fit even the largest arm. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tammer

customer_reviews.title: Great Elbow Brace for Tennis or Golfers Elbow
customer_reviews.text: This great elbow brace helped ease the pain in my "golfers elbow". I used it today and I played the entire round pain free and played well too. It even came with an extra brace and a great wrist sweatband that slso worked great. It was 110 degrees with the heat index here in Florida today. I highly recommend this Simiem elbow brace!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: WOW Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have a long road ahead of me with tennis elbow. My doctor indicated I needed to get a brace. I got 2 other ones before I tried this one. It fits well. The Velcro is very very strong. The pressure point is wide so it covers the affected area. I also appreciate that the Velcro does not rub on my skin as the others did. Plus you get 2 in the pack which is great as you begin to overcompensate the use of the other arm so 2 come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: "I'm not sure why these work, but they sure do. Within a few days of receiving my order, my tennis elbow pain was gone. I had been doing the prescribed excersizes as well, but I hadn't seen very quick results. After having the brace for support while working or working out, while continuing the excersizes, my pain vanished within a few days. These are great! Very comforting immediately."
customer_reviews.author: CCT

customer_reviews.title: Best Brace on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brace before being diagnosed with tennis elbow and it has been a life saver! If fits very comfortably under my sweatshirts with little bulk unlike other braces I have purchased. It is so comfortable that sometimes I forget I’m wearing it. I wear it all day and at night when I am sleeping and having two in this pack is the best deal on amazon!! Best purchase for this aching elbow!!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Best tennis elbow brace I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: The velcro is STRONG, so it holds into place. Both ends of strap have velcro, so easy to get on and adjust to correct size. The blue pressure pad is fabulous- very comfortable and effective. They did stink (chemical smell) when I first opened them- I'm very sensitive to odors and this one was particularly awful. I aired it out outside for 24 hours and it was just fine! I'm so pleased with this product, and it's a great value IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relief
customer_reviews.text: This comes with two braces and each brace has two choices for straps - a large one and a smaller one. The brace is very comfortable and allows me to workout pain free. I have been using it for a couple of months now and would recommend this for anyone with tennis elbow or other elbow nerve pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Whitely

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay but didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and used it while I played tennis. I didn’t get any relief from my tennis elbow. I also had issues with getting it secure enough. I needed to keep pulling the strap tighter while trying to get some relief. I tried using it during the day for aided support but I still did not find relief.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Finally found "The One"
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tennis elbow brace I've purchased! All the others are headed for the trash...The gel pad on this is terrific - thick, nice and firm, but gives a bit since it's gel. Great isolation of the tendon. The different size fasteners are a nice touch too - I have skinny arms and the small was a treat because it actually fit without extra length. I'm so happy to have found a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Fsd123

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief finally
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it says relieved my tennis elbow pain in a week. Continued using for the full month now do not even notice any pain without it which is great. Tight fit around my arm but granted I do have pretty big arms even with the large size band. Will keep these incase I ever get any pain again they worked great. Would recommend them to anyone with any king of elbow pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these while weight training to relieve the stress and torque placed on my elbows by my tendons. They really enable me to maintain a good workout with higher weights. I have tried other brands but after a few weeks the velcro stops holding. These bands are still holding and come with replacement bands in case the bands do finally stop holding.
customer_reviews.author: Roger E. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good product and did give some relief but not as much as others have stated. I like that it came with extra straps as I had to use the smallest one. I did end up having to get an injection from my doctor but continue to use the strap for tendon stability/relief while still healing.
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Pain free elbow - priceless !
customer_reviews.text: This simple little elbow brace was a miracle during the summer of COVID... a life saver for me. I don’t believe in miracle cures - and this is not a cure - but my elbow was so sore from non stop golf - being on the golf course or at the practice range almost every day since COVID began - this product allowed me to play pain free. Just picking up a bottle of Gatorade without this elbow brace hurts. But with this brace - there is no pain. The ROI for this product is priceless !
customer_reviews.author: Jay Block

customer_reviews.title: Buy This One
customer_reviews.text: A well-made elbow brace that does help my elbow greatly. Yes, it has a strange odor when it arrives; this goes away in a day or so, if the brace is left out overnight. I'm wearing the brace as I type this; I have to put my nose on the brace and sniff deeply to detect any trace of that scent now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones II

customer_reviews.title: Only had it one day and already getting relief
customer_reviews.text: For tennis elbow injury. Hurt my elbow in Nov 2018. Now it's June 2019 and it still hurts and is weak. Got the brace on Saturday, put it on Sunday afternoon, and already I'm feeling a great deal of relief from the pain, and the arm seems to be stronger. It's only been one day, but I'm so grateful for the relief!
customer_reviews.author: Muffingod

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- will not last
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Basically a Memory foam pad sewn Into a wristband with poor-mans velcro. The velcro strength gets weaker each time you undo it. I've already had to retighten it 6 times within the first 10 mins of my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Top 10 Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: It worked like magic. Two days later
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with tennis elbow for several month. I was spectacle when some my friend suggesting me to try the brace, since I had one ten years ago. Finally I had surgery to cure my problem. I searched amazon and found this one with highest rating. It was made entirely different with old brace. It worked like magic. Two days later, I can use my right hand playing Pickle-ball just like past. I would recommend to my friend who ever has the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: xiaoyu li

customer_reviews.title: An elbow brace that really works.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have had an exceptionally bad case of Medial Epicondylitis (Golfers elbow) for nearly 2 years, it's finally with a lot of PT and the daily use of this brace that I have some relief of the pain. This brace is the best one I've owned (and over 2 years I've had quite a few) it's durable and it works
customer_reviews.author: H. Sowle

customer_reviews.title: Finally, pain relief for chronic, severe tendinitis.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Works as advertised. Incredible relief from elbow and arm pain. I have suffered from tendinitis is my elbow (tennis elbow) for about one year. I have had multiple cortisone injections and have been through occupational and physical therapy. I have tried cold and warm compresses and various braces and wraps. I honestly began to believe that I would love with this terribly excruciating chronic pain for the rest of my life. NOTHING compares to this brace when it comes to alleviating my pain. Provides almost immediate relief—even when using my arm to carry my child or doing any other activity. This was my last hope, and I am so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Cfarag

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product that does the job. I can now play tennis with little or no pain, though I still need to ice the elbow when done. I was worried that I would have to quit for months, as some days I could hardly swing without pain. Now I play 3 times a week. Easy to use and very comfortable. Great to have a spare, though I haven’t had to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sniff

customer_reviews.title: Really works to protect my golfers elbow from swelling and pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many elbow support braces over 30 years. My Bandit elbow brace (which I liked a lot and found effective) recently broke. After reading reviews on Amazon I decided to try the Simien brace. This one is easy to adjust and put on. And I was surprised that I had no pain or stiffness after hitting balls on the driving range or after golf. It is less expensive than most of the braces that I have used. The only downside is that it is a little bulky and sometimes rubs against my body on the golf swing. On the other hand, it is a signal that the club is too close to my body.
customer_reviews.author: ernest

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Incredibly Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** After having a little bit of trouble with my original purchase, Simien immediately gave me a full refund and shipped another product, which works perfectly. Truly incredible customer service, something you don't see as much now a days. ***ORIGINAL*** The arm band seems to does a really good job with mitigating pain when it stays on. Unfortunately, the velcro isn't very strong, and if I strap it too tight (which I sometimes need to in order to quell my arm pain) the band comes undone.
customer_reviews.author: mechiegrad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Brace!!! 5 Stars all the way!
customer_reviews.text: "I currently have golf elbow and have been avoiding surgery with the use of cortisone shots, steroid cream and pain patches. This Simien golfers compression pad has helped tremendously with keeping the pain at bay. I am so glad I ordered this! Thank you!" Chris Castilla
customer_reviews.author: a r

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was basically a god-send for my tennis elbow. It allowed me to function when the injury was at its worst. The only downside was sometimes to get it as tight as I needed for support/pain, I had to tighten it to the point of cutting off circulation! (Which I then would lessen since I like having the lower half of my arm.) But seriously could not have survived without this.
customer_reviews.author: justanotherreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relief from pain!
customer_reviews.text: Despite never having played tennis, I've been plagued by tennis elbow (lateral epicondylitis) for the past two years. I saw the reviews of the Simien elbow brace and decided to give it a try. Wow! From the moment I put it on and found the right spot for the brace pad, my pain was gone. Entirely and instantly gone. You may have to experiment with different placements of the brace - higher or lower on your forearm, rotated towards the inside or outside of your arm - however once you find the right spot for you, it provides complete relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that helped my elbow pain
customer_reviews.text: After having elbow pain from kickboxing for three months, weekly acupuncture and massage appointments helped but I still had pain. Someone told me about elbow braces and after a quick search I picked Simien from the good reviews. After I wore this for 1 day! my elbow felt better. It’s amazing. I wear this now everyday and my pain is almost totally gone. We’ll see how I feel after I go back to kickboxing, but this has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: MVMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great design. Fits well. Felt relief in the first two hours that I had it on. Would buy again. This works better than the one my doctor gave me. There are 2 in the box & a complimentary wrist sweat band. There is a slight "rubber" smell, but the product is new, so that is expected. Pretty sure it will go away in less than a week. Even if it doesn't, the smell is not that strong at all. Great seller. Item arrived in less than 2 days & I didn't order 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Surely helps relieve tennis elbow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Surely helps relieve tennis elbow. I recommend wearing it for a few days even when you are walking. I suffered from Tennis elbow for a long time. The regular walking motion moves the elbows constantly which hurts, wearing this brace constantly helps a lot. Also do a lot of icepacks on the elbows 2-3 times per day for 5-10 minutes. This product works very well
customer_reviews.author: Rishi Ravani

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazingly Well on Tennis Elbow
customer_reviews.text: It's the only thing I've found that helps provide relief from tennis elbow. I have very slender arms so the ability to adjust the size is critical to get the right amount of resistance. Wearing it all day helps maintain the optimal pain-free state. Unfortunately, I had a tendency to stop wearing them when I did not expect to lift heavy objects. This was a mistake as even the most innocuous of tasks can be aggravating when you have tennis elbow. Wearing them as much as possible has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: siouxja

customer_reviews.title: Works but Pretty Tight on forearm.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this item and like it so far. I have a bad case of tennis elbow for over a month caused by overuse and arthritis. I don't have popeye forearms but the strap is pretty tight so much so that I can't wear the strap for more than 30 minutes at a time. Other than that, it does help with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: lipsterman

customer_reviews.title: So I bought it uz I need to do stuff to feel me good, till I bought it my pain has decreased ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the item one week ago, so I was testing the product. And really help me with my pain. A few weeks ago, I had a pain in muy arm that keep me away from sports, job and drive.... Yes dvriving too. So I bought it uz I need to do stuff to feel me good, till I bought it my pain has decreased considerably. Anyway I need surgery but it's a good treatment
customer_reviews.author: Rixh Serr Han O.

customer_reviews.title: Good relief for the price, not my favorite item
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t too bad. They take a while to understand how to make them work well. The goal isn’t to crush your arm, but give gradual tension releases. I wish the pads could be more rigid so I could find and press on the nerves more easily. I seem to have golfer’s elbow and tennis elbow despite playing neither sport. Lucky me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Weak Velcro
customer_reviews.text: The velcro does not hold when the brace is tightened enough to have a positive effect. Once tightened, if I move my arm at all the band pops off. However, I'm updating and upgrading my review to 3 stars based on the fact that this seller has been very accommodating and responsive to my concern regarding their product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Faith

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Painful elbow from computer use. Different brace I bought in the past didn't stay put. This is sturdy and well made, has enough velcro to keep it in place, and a nice large compression pad. Pain relief was immediate.. I use during the day and during sleep. Great that it comes with 2 strap sizes to fit different size arms.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Don't over tighten them.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but don't tighten too hard. I ended up with light bruising, totally my fault. Feels comfortable at first, but after a few hours, my arm started to hurt. My recommendation is adjust a tad loose and wait a couple of hours, if it's still loose then tighten a bit more. These straps really helped with the pain and I believe relieved the pain when they were off.
customer_reviews.author: Vulcan Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found these
customer_reviews.text: These are well made. Nice firm stretch, good comfort and worked like a charm. Had to wear them every day for quite a while for my tennis elbow to finally heal but having them allowed me to continue to work out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Simple, comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My golfer's elbow was making me miserable and hindering my exercise regime but this device has greatly improved my condition. It's comfortable and is easily positioned so that it applies pressure to the correct spot. I have large arms (XXL) and it just fits so it might not be big enough if you are The Rock, but for 99% it should be OK. It is well made and stands up well to sweat and wear & tear. Fully recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Elbow Pain
customer_reviews.text: I received it, I wore it for about two weeks and my elbow no longer hurts. Great product. Comfortable. Better than my ACE with the plastic pillow. The pillow deflated and that’s why I purchased a new one. I love that I have a set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: I wore this band for about 4 or 5 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore this band for about 4 or 5 weeks almost 24 hours a day to help with tendinitis in my elbow that I couldn't seem to overcome after 6 months. This band helped tremendously. I wear it occasionally now but my arm is almost 100% after about 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: This is a helpful temporary aid
customer_reviews.text: "The item arrived quickly and it is just what my girlfriend needed. She has "golf elbow" and has been having trouble even picking objects up. This brace gives her the support she needs as she completes the physical therapy she needs to do to recover. Thanks!"
customer_reviews.author: James M. Dial

customer_reviews.title: Pain relieving
customer_reviews.text: I have golfers elbow and these compression straps were recommended by my doctor. They definitely assisted with my workouts at the gym. In my case I also found pain relief when my workout was over and I took them off. A great purchase. They come with a lifetime guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but useless for golfer's elbow
customer_reviews.text: I developed golfer's elbow from lifting weights. This brace is high quality but did nothing to alleviate the pain in my elbow. I also found compression sleeves to be useless. The best thing I've found is the flexbar. You use it to do a series of exercises to strengthen your elbow/forearm area. It takes awhile, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Feels good, but not a Miracle
customer_reviews.text: This feels good as an elbow brace. However, I hoped they would protect my improving "tennis elbow" enough that I could hit for 45 - 50 minutes. My elbow felt pretty sore the next day. Guess I'm not quite ready to hit that long.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Livingston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sent back way to big and bulgie - I gave this item one star due to the item was to big and bulgie but I don’t think that was fair this item may work well for others I could not say that because I could use or ware. It was unfair for me to give this item only one star. The company contacted via mail to make matters better by offering other items that may fit better. What company does this to satisfy a customer thank u.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Prach

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put on, works instantly to put pressure where needed to ease tennis and golfers elbow (mom / grocery carrying elbow too!). Use while lifting or carrying heavy items, it seems to prevent irritation from these activities.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little bit with tendinitis
customer_reviews.text: I had tendinitis in both of my elbows. Really bad. I bought this product in a dead give me some relief but a lot of people don’t believe in it. I tried it and I think it’s worth a try if you have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen  McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic turned into believer.  Call the doc,  tell him I said ouch ;). Then buy one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Recovery at last. Took me six solid months to get over this tennis elbow ache. I wrench for a living and this brace provided a lot of support to keep me going. There were days I forgot and picking up a cordless drill was painful without it. Skeptic by nature but keep in toolbox and continue to use for support on some days to prevent ingury.
customer_reviews.author: ohell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended a band to allow my tennis elbow to heal. I purchased a cheaper band for 8 at Target, and it helped but it was bulky and irritated my skin too much to wear. I was worried about ordering another, but this band is perfect. I forget I'm wearing it, and it relieves my tennis elbow. I got the 2 pack that includes two bands, plus two additional straps, and is slim and doesn't scratch my arm, so it was well worth the price to me. I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I lift weights 5 days a week and golf frequently and these have made a big difference in allowing me to do these things and reduce the pain from medial epicondylitis (golfer's elbow). The padding offers good support directly to the tendon which works much better for me than those without padding. The brace is also thinner than other braces and doesn't interfere with any movements. Overall, a well made product and comes with a lifetime warranty...what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: focus

product_meta.title: Simien Tennis Elbow Brace (2-Count), Tennis & Golfer's Elbow Pain Relief with Compression Pad, Wrist Sweatband and E-Book
product_meta.description:
Get Some Relief For Your Tennis Elbow Pain!

The best elbow brace/forearm band on the market that helps with:

- Tennis elbow, golfer’s elbow, computer or mouse elbow, rower’s or rowing elbow, fishing elbow, pool or billiard elbow, luggage elbow, hammer elbow, weightlifting elbow. 
- Repetitive stress motion injuries like lateral epicondylitis, elbow tendonitis, carpal tunnel syndrome or arthritis. 
- Amazing armband for Crossfit, weightlifters, basketball, badminton, squash and racquetball players. 
- Pain relief for elbow hyperextension. Can also be used for construction workers who engage in repetitive arm motions. Superior Value and Quality

- UNIQUE - Only product on the market that contains two elbow braces, wristband and an Ebook 
- AMAZING VALUE - You can't find a better price for a high quality product! 
- EFFECTIVE - Protects your elbow and forearm from nagging pain. Get your BONUS Ebook with your purchase!

GUARANTEED TO LAST or your money back!

Get Pain Relief Now and Click "Add To Cart" at the Top of this Page.
feature_bullets: ✔ BONUS ITEM & FREE PRODUCT: You will receive a bonus sweat wristband with your order as well as an E-book entitled "Addressing Tennis Elbow Pain". The E-book will give you INSTRUCTIONS on how to use our product, the tools and knowledge to address tennis elbow pain, including additional online resources such as exercises and therapies that have been shown to be helpful for tennis elbow sufferers.

✔ AMAZING VALUE: You get TWO elbow braces for a much lower price. Cannot compare with other brands: you will be getting two elbow braces, a sweat wristband and an E-book. With a 2-count elbow brace, you can keep one in your gym or tennis bag and have another one at home or work for any repetitive motions that cause lateral epicondylitis, elbow tendonitis, carpal tunnel syndrome or arthritis pain.

✔ MUSCLE TISSUE & JOINT PAIN RELIEF: Can be used for tennis elbow, golfer’s elbow, computer or mouse elbow, rower’s elbow, fishing elbow, pool or billiard elbow. Can also be used as an armband for weightlifting, basketball or activities that could result in elbow hyperextension. This brace has a compression gel like pad that works better than air pads. Get 25% off our Simien Rubber Twist Bar using ELBOWSOS promo code at checkout for tennis elbow therapy exercises when you buy the braces.

✔ VERSATILE: One size fits most and can be used on the left or right forearm. Can complement or replace elbow compression sleeves. Works great for women and men thanks to the adjustable strap. Fits almost all size or money back. This is a hook and loop strap and we guarantee that it will not cut off circulation or have a tourniquet effect on your forearm.

✔ HIGHEST QUALITY: 65% neoprene and 35% nylon (Logo is natural rubber or NOT LATEX FREE!). This is built to last and we guarantee that the strap will not wear out or tear apart for a lifetime or you will get your money back. You can keep your elbow braces (and bonuses) and we will refund you for your purchase. Click the ADD TO CART button to order our product at our LIMITED LOW PRICE.
